Contagion of
Corona Covid19

Stay home, Stay safe and Stay healthy, Maintain at least 1 meter (3 feet) distance between yourself and who is coughing or sneezing

Human Contact

Virus is spread mainly from man to man. Hands touch many surfaces and pick up viruses. Once contaminated, hands can transfer the virus.

Air Transmission

Virus may spread through airborne when tiny Droplets remain in the air, so we have to use mask to prevent this virus Safely and be safe as well as healthy

Contaminated Objects

Touching a object that has the virus. Grocery stores, Restaurants, Food processing plants, even your home food contamination can happen so have to careful

Information about
Coronavirus disease

Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a new virus, Which is began in Wuhan a city in China.

The disease causes respiratory illness (like the flu) with symptoms such as a cough, fever, and in more severe cases, difficulty breathing. You can protect yourself by washing your hands frequently, avoiding touching your face, and avoiding close contact (1 meter or 3 feet) with people who are unwell.

Learn More Watch video

Coronavirus Symptom

This is the symptom of the virus and how can you realize that
you are affected by this Coronavirus

Headache

Headache is one of main symptom of causes coronavirus disease

Fever

Fever is also one of main symptom of causes coronavirus disease

Cough

Cough the is one of main symptom of causes coronavirus disease

Sore Throat

Sore Throat is another symptom of causes coronavirus disease

Vomit

Vomiting a is one of main symptom of causes coronavirus disease

Shortness of Breath

Shortness of breath is the main symptom of coronavirus disease

Prevention of
Coronavirus Covid19

Stay home, Stay safe and Stay healthy, Maintain at least 1 meter (3 feet)
distance between yourself and who is coughing or sneezing

Wear a Mask

Avoid close Contact

Stay at Home

Wash your Hand

Cover Coughs & Sneezes

Clean & Disinfect
